excerpt: "AI-driven beauty and wellness company, Oddity Tech (NASDAQ:ODD), made a stunning debut on the public market, with its shares soaring 40% above the initial public offering (IPO) price. CNBC reported the company reached an approximate market valuation of $2.8 billion as of midday trading on Wednesday."
